scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w webpack.config.js -w package.json -w .stylelintrc -w .stylelintignore -w .eslintrc.json --exec 'npm run dev'
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --display-error-details --config webpack.config.dev.js --progress && cpx "src/shared/assets/images/*.{svg,jpg,png}" dist/Scope.Website/imgs && cpx "src/scope/assets/images/*.{svg,jpg,png}" dist/Scope.Website/imgs && cpx "src/shared/assets/fonts/*.{woff,woff2}" dist/Scope.Website/fonts
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.dev.js && cpx "src/shared/assets/images/*.{svg,jpg,png}" dist/Scope.Website/imgs && cpx "src/scope/assets/images/*.{svg,jpg,png}" dist/Scope.Website/imgs && cpx "src/shared/assets/fonts/*.{woff,woff2}" dist/Scope.Website/fonts
scripts.start:jobboard: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w webpack--jobboard.config.js -w package.json -w .stylelintrc -w .stylelintignore -w .eslintrc.json --exec 'npm run dev:jobboard'
scripts.build:jobboard: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --display-error-details --config webpack--jobboard.config.dev.js --progress && cpx "src/shared/assets/images/*.{svg,jpg,png}" dist/JobBoard.Website/imgs && cpx "src/jobboard/assets/images/*.{svg,jpg,png}" dist/JobBoard.Website/imgs && cpx "src/shared/assets/fonts/*.{woff,woff2}" dist/JobBoard.Website/fonts
scripts.build:jobboard:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack--jobboard.config.dev.js && cpx "src/shared/assets/images/*.{svg,jpg,png}" dist/JobBoard.Website/imgs && cpx "src/jobboard/assets/images/*.{svg,jpg,png}" dist/JobBoard.Website/imgs && cpx "src/shared/assets/fonts/*.{woff,woff2}" dist/JobBoard.Website/fonts

scripts.build:workwithme: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --display-error-details --config webpack--workwithme.config.dev.js --progress && cpx "src/shared/assets/images/*.{svg,jpg,png}" dist/WorkWithMe.Website/imgs && cpx "src/workwithme/assets/images/*.{svg,jpg,png}" dist/WorkWithMe.Website/imgs && cpx "src/shared/assets/fonts/*.{woff,woff2}" dist/WorkWithMe.Website/fonts
